body_html:
This work actually implements iterative pruning (part of Deep compression) on TF.
embedding_lookup_sparse operation is used to do sparse matrix multiplication.
I've got some of speedups with this prototype, but it's somewhat mediocre.
I think it's because of a small size of the model and sparse matrix format that TF uses as a default (COO).
body_text:
This work actually implements iterative pruning (part of Deep compression) on TF.
embedding_lookup_sparse operation is used to do sparse matrix multiplication.
I've got some of speedups with this prototype, but it's somewhat mediocre.
I think it's because of a small size of the model and sparse matrix format that TF uses as a default (COO).
body:
This [work](https://github.com/garion9013/impl-pruning-TF) actually implements iterative pruning (part of Deep compression) on TF.
_embedding_lookup_sparse_ operation is used to do sparse matrix multiplication.
I've got some of speedups with this prototype, but it's somewhat mediocre.
I think it's because of a small size of the model and sparse matrix format that TF uses as a default (COO).
